text: Tara pichata (sihamtaka sasti diya haichila) sihamtara angikara bhangara babe, allahara ayatasamuhara lagata kupharai karaara babe arau ‘amara hrdayasamuha acchadita’ e'i katha koraara babe. Baram sihamtara kupharaira babe allahe sihamtara antarasamuhata mohara marai dichila. Seye kerala sihamtara kichusankhyaka loke'i imana aniba
